Pacman.Model
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  Pacman.Model.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The map class stores map information. GameCharacters will use the Map object to check for collisions and the gui will use the Map object to render the game level.

See Also:

passMapBlockCentre

public boolean passMapBlockCentre(Vector position,
                                  Vector step)
Returns true if position is at the centre of a MapBlock or if the center is passed when performing a step

Parameters:
position - Original position to check
step - Step to go

getMapBlockCentre

public Vector getMapBlockCentre(Vector position,
                                Direction direction)
Returns the coordinates of the next MapBlock center you pass when going from position in the given direction.

Compared to the getNextMapBlock(Vector, Vector) method, this method can return the coordinates of the MapBlock in which position is situated. In this case it returns the same value as getGridPosition(position).

Parameters:
position -
direction -
See Also:
getGridPosition(Vector)

getNextMapBlock

public Vector getNextMapBlock(Vector position,
                              Vector direction)
Returns coordinates of the neighbor MapBlock in the given direction.

Compared to the getMapBlockCentre(Vector, Direction) method, this method never returns the coordinates of the MapBlock in which position is situated.

Parameters:
position - Position to check.
direction - Direction to go from position.

computeDotsLeft

public void computeDotsLeft()
Calculates how many dots are left to eat, before the game is won.

eat

boolean eat(Vector position)
Returns:
Whether the block at the provided position can be eaten by the player

collision

boolean collision(Vector position)
Returns:
Whether the block at the provided position can collide with the player or ghosts.

special

boolean special(Vector position)
Returns:
Whether the block at the provided position will enable special item mode, once eaten
